bill.title: EATS Act of 2021 Enhance Access To SNAP Act of 2021
bill.description: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to treat attendance at an institution of higher education the same as work for the purpose of determining eligibility to participate in the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
